front.title: Deriving Fast Handover Key from MSK to secure the FMIPv6 signaling

abstract.t: This specification introduces a symmetric cryptography mechanism forprotecting signaling messages between the Mobile Node and previousAccess Router for Fast Mobile IPv6. The method defined here utilizesthe Master Session Key(MSK) generated from EAP authentication toderive a fast handover key between the Mobile Node and the AccessRouter in order to avoid certain attacks. This mechanism also adoptsthe Mobile Node Identifier option and the mobility messageauthentication option to the FMIPv6 signaling messages.
